#!/bin/bash /usr/bin/mkdir /etc/zypp/repos.d/original /usr/bin/mv /etc/zypp/repos.d/*-update.repo /etc/zypp/repos.d/openSUSE* /etc/zypp/repos.d/original/ /usr/bin/unlink /usr/bin/python3 && /usr/bin/ln -s /usr/bin/python3.11 /usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/wget -O /etc/motd http://get_lab_infra_server_hostname/ksmanager-hub/addons-for-kickstarts/motd.txt /usr/bin/date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z' > /etc/bigbang /usr/bin/mkdir -p /home/get_mgmt_super_user/.ssh /root/.ssh /usr/bin/chmod 0700 /home/get_mgmt_super_user/.ssh /root/.ssh /usr/bin/wget -O /home/get_mgmt_super_user/.ssh/authorized_keys http://get_lab_infra_server_hostname/ksmanager-hub/addons-for-kickstarts/authorized_keys /usr/bin/wget -O /home/get_mgmt_super_user/.ssh/kvm_lab_global_id_rsa.pub http://get_lab_infra_server_hostname/ksmanager-hub/addons-for-kickstarts/kvm_lab_global_id_rsa.pub /usr/bin/wget -O /home/get_mgmt_super_user/.ssh/kvm_lab_global_id_rsa http://get_lab_infra_server_hostname/ksmanager-hub/addons-for-kickstarts/kvm_lab_global_id_rsa /usr/bin/cp -p /home/get_mgmt_super_user/.ssh/{authorized_keys,kvm_lab_global_id_rsa.pub,kvm_lab_global_id_rsa} /root/.ssh/ /usr/bin/chmod 0600 /home/get_mgmt_super_user/.ssh/{authorized_keys,kvm_lab_global_id_rsa} /root/.ssh/{authorized_keys,kvm_lab_global_id_rsa} /usr/bin/chmod 0644 /home/get_mgmt_super_user/.ssh/kvm_lab_global_id_rsa.pub /root/.ssh/kvm_lab_global_id_rsa.pub /usr/bin/chown -R get_mgmt_super_user:users /home/get_mgmt_super_user/.ssh /usr/bin/echo -e "HISTSIZE=-1
HISTFILESIZE=-1" | /usr/bin/tee -a /home/get_mgmt_super_user/.bashrc /root/.bashrc var_PS1_variable_get_mgmt_super_user=$(/usr/bin/curl -s -L http://get_lab_infra_server_hostname/ksmanager-hub/addons-for-kickstarts/PS1-env-variable-normal-user) /usr/bin/echo "${var_PS1_variable_get_mgmt_super_user}" >> /home/get_mgmt_super_user/.bashrc var_PS1_variable_root=$(/usr/bin/curl -s -L http://get_lab_infra_server_hostname/ksmanager-hub/addons-for-kickstarts/PS1-env-variable-root-user) /usr/bin/echo "${var_PS1_variable_root}" >> /root/.bashrc /usr/bin/echo "get_mgmt_super_user ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >/etc/sudoers.d/get_mgmt_super_user /usr/bin/systemctl disable kdump /usr/bin/echo 'kernel.hostname=get_hostname.get_ipv4_domain' > /etc/sysctl.d/hostname.conf /usr/bin/get_golden_image_creation_not_requested || /usr/bin/wget -O /etc/systemd/system/golden-image-setup.service http://get_lab_infra_server_hostname/ksmanager-hub/addons-for-kickstarts/golden-image-setup.service /usr/bin/get_golden_image_creation_not_requested || /usr/bin/wget -O /root/golden-image-setup.sh http://get_lab_infra_server_hostname/ksmanager-hub/addons-for-kickstarts/golden-image-setup.sh /usr/bin/get_golden_image_creation_not_requested || /usr/bin/ln -s /etc/systemd/system/golden-image-setup.service /etc/systemd/system/multi-user.target.wants/golden-image-setup.service /usr/bin/get_golden_image_creation_not_requested || /usr/bin/wget -O /etc/systemd/system/golden-boot-opensuse-leap.service http://get_lab_infra_server_hostname/ksmanager-hub/kickstarts/get_hostname.get_ipv4_domain/golden-boot-opensuse-leap.service /usr/bin/get_golden_image_creation_not_requested || /usr/bin/wget -O /root/golden-boot-opensuse-leap.sh http://get_lab_infra_server_hostname/ksmanager-hub/kickstarts/get_hostname.get_ipv4_domain/golden-boot-opensuse-leap.sh /usr/bin/get_golden_image_creation_not_requested || /usr/bin/ln -s /etc/systemd/system/golden-boot-opensuse-leap.service /etc/systemd/system/multi-user.target.wants/golden-boot-opensuse-leap.service local_lab_info=$(/usr/bin/echo 'get_ipv4_domain' | /usr/bin/sed "s/\./-/g") /usr/bin/mkdir -p /etc/ssh/ssh_config.d && /usr/bin/echo -e "Host *.get_ipv4_domain get_subnets_to_allow_ssh_pub_access
 IdentityFile ~/.ssh/kvm_lab_global_id_rsa
 StrictHostKeyChecking no
 UserKnownHostsFile /dev/null
 LogLevel QUIET" > /etc/ssh/ssh_config.d/999-kvm-lab-global.conf /usr/bin/ln -s /usr/lib/systemd/system/autofs.service /etc/systemd/system/multi-user.target.wants/autofs.service /usr/bin/mkdir /server-hub /lab-share /lab-web-share /usr/bin/sed -i 's/^[[:space:]]*#\+[[:space:]]*\(+dir:/etc/auto\.master\.d\)/\1/' /etc/auto.master /usr/bin/echo "/- /etc/auto.master.d/auto-${local_lab_info}" > /etc/auto.master.d/direct.autofs /usr/bin/cat << EOF > /etc/auto.master.d/auto-${local_lab_info} /server-hub -fstype=nfs,soft,timeo=5,retrans=2 get_lab_infra_server_hostname:/server-hub /lab-web-share -fstype=nfs,soft,timeo=5,retrans=2 get_lab_infra_server_hostname:/get_lab_infra_server_hostname /lab-share -fstype=nfs,soft,timeo=5,retrans=2 get_lab_infra_server_hostname:/lab-share EOF
